mapper.insert: insert into `sfile` (sfile_id, sfile_name, sfile_url, sfile_size, sfile_type, create_by, update_by) values (#{sfileId}, #{sfileName}, #{sfilePath}, #{sfileSize}, #{sfileType}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM `sfile` WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT id FROM ( SELECT id FROM sfile WHERE (sfile_url, create_time) IN ( SELECT sfile_url, MAX(create_time) FROM sfile GROUP BY sfile_url ) ) AS temp )
